website_summaries.verdict: A great fit if you're going for a warm, rustic look. However, assembly can be a chore and we advise taking extra care to avoid damaging vital components.
pros: Six spacious drawers deliver ample storage room
Metal runners and safety stops allow for fluid opening and closing without the risk of injured toes
Assembly instructions are clear and easy to follow
cons: Assembly can be incredibly time consuming
Some owners reported that some components were easily damaged during assembly

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to assemble but finished product is worth ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to assemble but finished product is worth it. Was very pleasantly surprised at how heavy duty this line of furniture is. Purchased the night stand, headboard, armoire and 6 drawer dresser. Planning on ordering the tall dresser shortly. I do have to admit that I wasn't the one who put together but hubby was smiling when he finally finished all the pieces and he still likes the set. It takes a while but for the price it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Assembly required
customer_reviews.text: If you order this dresser it will require significant set up time - at least for me it did - 3 plus hours. It shows up on your porch in a very heavy box and was hard to bring inside - Also after putting it together some of the drawers didn't line up properly - and I followed directions precisely. This is not a good value for you what you would pay. I was disappointed in the overall quality and would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do it someplace close by where you will place it , side of the are fragile
customer_reviews.text: I love the finished product, customer service was awesome if you have issues and they will send replacement parts. It took me 3 hours to put it together alone with a screw driver, lining drawers was a pain but for the price I d do it again
customer_reviews.author: MOI

customer_reviews.title: Like everyone says it did take awhile to get together ...
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone says it did take awhile to get together and looks great. The only issue is the alignment on the drawers. No matter what I tried on the bottom right drawer it still seems to rub a bit. Eventually I imagine it'll wear away the spot wear it's rubbing. The top right drawer sticks on one side and I cant figure out what's holding it up. Also I noticed the upper left corner has a small gap. Maybe I can fill it with something so it's not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: Updated — Yikes
customer_reviews.text: 7/17/18 Update: There’s one drawer that has been stuck since I put this thing together. Literally can’t get it out without breaking it. 5/6 drawers isnt the worst but it’s incredibly annoying. ... This was the most infuriating piece of furniture I’ve ever put together. If you’re doing it by yourself, be ready to spend a large part of your day assembling it. Had multiple pieces that weren’t drilled quite right so the screws were completely stripped by the time I got them in. But the final result is gorgeous and sturdy and I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful. Very sturdy. It took me like 8 hours to put together but I took alot of breaks and I did it alone. The instructions are perfect, there is no way you can mess it up. I love it and my husband was amazed when he saw it and the fact I did it by myself. Its a beautiful piece. Very well worth the money, time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: annette madrigal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is sturdy and the finish is beautiful. The instructions are pretty easy to follow and everything matched up perfectly. The reason for 4 stars is because the hardware count was all over the place. I got plenty extra in some and others I had to run to Lowes to buy more so putting it together took much longer than it should have. Other than that, I'm very happy with my selection as this was the first time I ordered furniture from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DarkMood

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointment
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the dresser. I have another Sauder piece, so I am very satisfied with the product. My disappointment came with Amazon dropping the price $60.00 just days after I purchased it. That didnt seem too fair to me, but I guess thats the way it goes. I purchase alot of items and use my prime throughout the year and will continue to do so. I just wanted to vent my disappointment in Amazon. Thanks! David Griner
customer_reviews.author: David S Griner

customer_reviews.title: Love the rustic aesthitic!!
customer_reviews.text: Handsome, sturdy, super heavy. Not wood all the way through, it is a veneer, but amazing quality. Took a while to put together, which is expected, but not too long. Instructions were easy to follow. I'm a small lady and I was able to put it together myself. I'm extremely happy with this purchase. I bought the dresser, chest, and nightstand for teenage son's room. He loved it! The drawers are reinforced so he won't bust through them in a month!
customer_reviews.author: Lore

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has a great look to it. But it's fake wood. It does chip and peel easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Drawers don't align
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy furniture would be great if the screws to hold the drawer sliders were deep enough. I bought 3 pieces of this furniture set, all assembled nicely except the largest piece, the 6 drawer dresser. Drawers on the right side have never been align, and after a few months of not using one, now 2 are completely unusable. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Not solid wood
customer_reviews.text: You would think if you buy a dresser over $300 that you assemble yourself it would be made of solid wood but it is fake wood laminate. I still love it, it is still beautiful and big enough. I just thought it would be real wood since it is a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Needs minor tweak- cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look although wood laminate outter portion could cover better Very heavy! Mark this review a helpful if you find it to be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but assembly... good grief
customer_reviews.text: I do not mind putting furniture together. I can follow directions and if it takes six hours that is fine by me. This will take you six hours. Or a little each day. I love the look but like another has mentioned I had to drill new holes. The ones measured were incorrect and that is such a pain. My biggest suggestion is to use a measuring tape every step of the way to make sure the drawer glides match up with the dresser. Or pick something else out. I kinda wish I did...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this after receiving the matching chest of drawers for christmas. The dresser is very nice and sturdy. It is a very pretty color. My only complaint is how heavy it was, and the amount of time it took to put it together. All together worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but a b..... to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very nice finished product. My husband put it together and had a b..... of a time putting all the piceces together. One drawer seems to catch when opening. Same thing with night stand of same set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is garbage. Spent forever putting it together, the drawers don’t align, the plastic tracks crack every time you open one. The box it comes in weighs a ton, takes 3+hours to assemble, because it comes in a million pieces; just don’t. The scariest part is, *DONT BUY THIS IF YOU HABE KIDS*, very very unsturdy, BIG SAFETY CONCERN. The dresser wobbles to side to side. I’m always worried it’s just going to fall apart. If I could give this NO STARS, I would.
customer_reviews.author: @Red_love_shine

customer_reviews.title: The hours to assemble will feel like years...
customer_reviews.text: It looks great....but be prepared to dedicate several hours to assembling this dresser. When they say you have to assemble every single part that is no exageration. I would love to get the nightstands, but there is no way I have the guts to attempt this hellscape for a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Gorski

customer_reviews.title: Love the wooden rustic look
customer_reviews.text: This dresser was definitely pricey, but worth it. Love the wooden rustic look. It is bigger than it looks in the photo. Takes up more than half of a wall in our bedroom. Definitely lots of space, however, and looks nice. Fairly easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre, probably not worth >$300
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need a lot of space for assembly. Tried to do it in my small bedroom and a lot of maneuvering was involved. The top piece was busted at one of the corners. Also having issues with drawer alignment and drawer overlap. I think it’s to do with imperfect placement of the sliders. Overall I think they could have partially assembled the simple things like the sliders and the front aesthetic wood piece on the drawers. Definitely a VERY heavy box- luckily I had it delivered right into my home. Tempted to return but I don’t think I’d ever get it apart without losing my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lily O

customer_reviews.title: Pretty piece
customer_reviews.text: It's really pretty! It just takes too long to assemble and you really need to pay attention to instructions and be careful with the drawers, we took a long time to figure how to put them, they were not fitting so they weren't closing. Overall I love it, it looks great and fits enough clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and pretty easy to put together. It took some time, but was not a complicated assembly. What was most impressive is how well is was packaged for shipping. So often heavy items arrive with the box falling apart and product damaged - not the case with this item!! Very happy. HIGHLY recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: mollie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece of furniture. Relatively easy to put together. Better than other peices of furniture I've brought that had to be assembled. Drawers are deep compared to what I was replacing with it. I was able to fit nearly everything into four drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good piece with this price.
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for kids, and they like it. It was easy to build (but it took an hour+ to complete). One thing we disappointed was that wood was compressed wood (chipboard) but not a real wood. If it was a real wood, I give 5 stars. But thinking about price, appearance and quality, I think 3-4 stars. This product was sent by two long boxed and they are very heavy. So, you had better ask carrier to bring it into your house.
customer_reviews.author: Hidetoshi Mori

customer_reviews.title: Not assembled.
customer_reviews.text: So is a really nice dresser. That said, if you’re not handy or don’t have some time, you should know that this arrives as a “to be built” piece. None of the assembly is done. I bought two of them, and if I didn’t have an extremely capable husband, would have had to return them. Glad he’s here because I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl K. Seibel

customer_reviews.title: Darker than photo and 6 hours to assemble alone
customer_reviews.text: Took me 6 hours to finish assembling this dresser by myself although the instructions are clear, there's just so many pieces and parts. It's also darker than it looks in the photo. The rollers for each drawer was a bit hard to adjust so it looks like the drawers are not aligned so it looks like some are sagging. I do like that the drawers are deeper than my previous dressers so I can store more
customer_reviews.author: Diem N.

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty nice for compressed wood. You get what you pay for. This type of furniture its better than the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Arc

customer_reviews.title: Take your time why rush.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other chipboard bureaus this one I liked best. Item shipped in a double box so only the outside box was a little damaged original packaging held up great. No issues during assembly. I had mixed thoughts reading the reviews but I had no issues. We are very happy with the final product all draws fit and slid great and joints were solid. I plan on getting other pieces in this set now.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Casey

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It’s really beautiful and unique. It has a woodsy smell. We paid someone to put it together because there’s a lot of pieces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We just love this furniture! The drawers were a little tricky but we got it and it is sturdy and the drawers glide and it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: SusieQMax

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Surprised. My husband and I put this together in about 3 hours. Very solid and very pretty. Very happy ! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri's ultimate view

customer_reviews.title: Great buy in a line of bedroom furniture
customer_reviews.text: purchased dresser chest, dresser, night stand. I am over 70 so it took me over 8 hours to put the dresser together, thank god for elect. screw drivers .I am doing bedroom in western style, Furniture in this line is amazing quality.heavy and looks great.. I don:t understand the problems with drawer alignments, three pieces I assembled I had no trouble with fit or smooth operation. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex v.

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture & easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Great piece for the price. Assembly instructions were easy to follow & all of the items were marked clearly. I put this piece together by myself in 4 hours. The drawers were the most time consuming for me. The box this is delivered in is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This dresser was easy to assemble and looks really nice. The drawers slide easily. It fits my needs and it’s a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great dresser for the value. Only way it could be better is if it was solid wood construction ($$$). Had reservations after reading the reviews but really didn’t run into the same issues. Take your time read directions and then start. We now have the bookshelf and dresser. Our son’s room looks great.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very time consuming to put it together but love how it turned out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dresser and it's heavy and solid, which I like. The one disappointment I'd none of the drawers are flush with the frame when they're all shut.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected it. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy and of good material this dresser is despite the low price. It was easy to assemble, it took time, but everything was clear. I would recommend this dresser to anyone, I expected the quality to be much worse but I rate it well because of my satisfaction with it and how much it adds to the room its placed in.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This item was HEAVY, but it looks so good. The quality is very durable and feel sturdy, I wouldn't be able to carry all the boxes alone, thank god it was shipped through Amazon. The price is reasonable and I always get compliment whenever I have visitors.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S. Kong

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made beautiful unit, once assembled. However- and for non handy types this is huge- it arrived in two flat boxes, completely unassembled, with hundreds of small parts. A neighboring contractor helped put it together and I’m very happy with it now.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: but fortunately none of the crushed or crumbled edges ended up ...
customer_reviews.text: The manufactured wood leaves a lot to be desired, but fortunately none of the crushed or crumbled edges ended up being visible. There were a few misaligned holes and warped pieces that led to some not-quite-flush edges, but it's nothing you would notice at a glance. It feels very sturdy, and the drawers slide easily. Overall a nice piece of starter furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dresser. It's very sturdy and easy to put together. Completely changed the look of my bedroom. A little rustic and alot beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: E. Parduhn

customer_reviews.title: This was a great look for my bedroom that I am doing in ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great look for my bedroom that I am doing in an African motif. The unit went together smoothly. I suggest having at least two people to put it together. It is very sturdy and the drawers work well. So for the price it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Nit too easy to put together, took a couple hours BUT great quality, I have find and tons of clithes packed in mine and it is very heavy duty and sturdy. Beautiful piece to my bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: gracie abel

customer_reviews.title: This look good.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it took too long in the mail to come but will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ELI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, solid piece of furniture. Easy to put together, but time consuming. Totally worth it. Looks fantastic, and it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Check pieces thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: I had so many chopped pieces. When the delivery drivers brought it into my house, the damaged part of the box was on the floor. There were so many chipped pieces, I had to return it and won't take a chance of buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: The Iliad and the odyssey ...and the dresser.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Feels sturdy. Good price point. I would complain about how long it took to put together but time is a flat circle.
customer_reviews.author: michael murphy

customer_reviews.title: I loved the dresser
customer_reviews.text: After installation, I loved the dresser. During the assembly we had a little difficulty on the drawers. Just take your time and don't rush through. We have a 50' flat screen TV sitting on the top and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Worth professional assembly option
customer_reviews.text: The dresser is nice for the price. Has a great look. With the other reviews noting it was time consuming for assembly, I opted for the professional assembly option. And I am very glad I did, it took them two hours to put together. Perfect for the space I have and the color is exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Laynella

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and not difficult to assemble. Good quality. Great colors. Love the rustic look!
customer_reviews.author: Green Woman

customer_reviews.title: Very handsome and sturdy when assembled
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome and sturdy when assembled. Heavy as hell. Takes a very, very, very long time to put together by yourself--but it will last much longer than the POS Ikea dresser you just threw out. Also having a hard time getting the drawers perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: draws stick
customer_reviews.text: The dresser is great visually - however the draws don't go in and out! They get stuck constantly - one we just leave open all of the time because we are sick of trying to open and close it. So disappointing :-(
customer_reviews.author: rachel criscuolo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a general contractor and it took us both a couple of hours to put together.....but it was a third of the price we would have paid from a furniture store. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards

customer_reviews.title: had to carry it up 2 flights of stairs so not fun. Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I saw someone else's comment that said this was real wood. This is NOT wood. It's surprisingly REALLY heavy though... had to carry it up 2 flights of stairs so not fun. Looks fantastic. Did take me a little while to put together, and some of the holes on the drawer tracks didn't line up on the right/ left so the drawers were crooked. I had to drill my own holes to make the drawers line up... which was annoying, but I really like the look of this.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerAtl23

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad to build if you're careful
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Save some money by building it yourself if you have the time. Looks really cute but the drawers do have a tendency to come out lopsided
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Was not the color in the picture.. much darker an doesnt match
customer_reviews.author: moon

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this dresser! Looks great and very sturdy. It took some time to put together but was not hard to do.
customer_reviews.author: Anessa

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Super heavy. One knob was defective. :(
customer_reviews.author: Luvxim

customer_reviews.title: Love this dresser!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this dresser! It was a little bit of a task to assemble, but it is solid and a high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product not durable
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the difficulty in putting together, and there were missing pieces. I like the color
customer_reviews.author: Yanira Penry

customer_reviews.title: You do need a drill for that patent pending thing
customer_reviews.text: The assembly and instructions are absurdly complicated and this was a complete and total waste of money. SO DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Boyington

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A furniture itself is pretty good, but it's hardly to adjust drawers to move smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Roman S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice rustic look.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this looks. Has a great rustic finish.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence s.

customer_reviews.title: Need Trouble shooting for hard to open drawers.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom two drawers stick and if is hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thing was cracked outa the box... took hours to put together
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: but it looks AMAZING! So chic
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit more involved than building something from Ikea, but it looks AMAZING! So chic, and so affordable!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing. I'm really amazed with it's quality. It was very easy to put it together (but I have tons of experience with putting furniture together). The reason I gave it 4 stars are the tracks for the drawers. They're cheap and should be better quality. I had problems with few drawers getting off the track or getting stucked. I figured out that to be able to fix the problem I installed some washers under those tracks. Otherwise it's a great looking bedroom set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty, but not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty, but not worth the hassle. I received the parts in two different boxes and was looking for the missing parts because no one informed me of this, I thought they were missing. It took my brother a week to assemble this drawer as he had to build it at night (after work hours). There are way too many pieces and they're not labeled, so it was a guessing game for him to put it together. One of the drawers doesn't fit well in the socket no matter how much he tried to fix it, it remains uneven. It does look nice once built.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: A pain to assemble, but finished product looks great
customer_reviews.text: Ok so here's the low down with this dresser. It says craftsman oak which may be referring to a pressed particle board maybe? Because it's not a real solid wood. However, after its all put together-- which will take a while...... Literally every piece of this you will be assembling, it actually looks pretty sweet!! It's a faux type wood but really does give the look of a rustic wood piece. We have the night stands as well and it all looks really great. Just be patient with the assembly:)
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, beautiful look, I can't say enough about this dresser! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kippelen

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty dresser. Very stinky dresser
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty dresser. Very stinky dresser. Heavy but not as sturdy as I would like. Still for the money....great dresser.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great little chest. I didn't put it together so I don't know how tough it was. So yea, it's particle board, but it's sturdy and really looks great in the room! Sure can't tell it's not great wood.
customer_reviews.author: realtexan

product_meta.title: Sauder Dakota Pass 6-Drawer Dresser, Craftsman Oak finish
product_meta.description: Achieve a rustic aesthetic in your bedroom with this 6-drawer dresser from the Dakota Pass collection. It features six drawers that open and close on smooth metal runners with safety stops, making it perfect for stashing away your shirts, flannels, and denim jeans. Finished in Craftsman Oak, this handsome dresser holds all your stuff and looks good doing it.
feature_bullets: Safety tested for stability to help reduce tip-over accidents
Drawers with metal runners and safety stops feature patented T-lock assembly system for easy assembly
Quick and easy assembly with patented slide-on moldings – because we know your time is valuable
This dresser has been thoroughly tested in an ISO 17025 accredited lab that is Underwriters Laboratories certified
It meets ASTM International's industry standard ASTM F2057-19 Safety Specification for Clothing Storage Units, which is intended to reduce hazards to children 5 and under due to tip-over of furniture

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars123 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
